name: varmbrakumi
definition: benga per ka jenai samui

name: eleaistio
definition: (eleaistio ishke kara; eleaistio kirkas kara)

name: skalvi
definition: lumi/upaš ka har iššilik ele au fuva pol

name: narúpaš
definition: (narúga + upaš) – upaš ka nai deki kešténa

name: dzebing
definition: per mah (ištšì os ištšìlik ting) bli samúi-iśi

name: žot
definition: (ende hav einn imi: hono žot ting) – samúi-iśi 🧊 bli ištšì grunn vapa

name: dzebingárga
definition: (dzebing + arga) – koske einn tel fu metoba (mangeslutšalik godža) dzebing au mange arga

name: upašvatsytbol
definition: (upaš + vatsyt + bol) plas doko du bolvatsyt ⛸️

name: barid
definition: suruko, tingko Ting ka slucha koske du mange samuisuruko: suru na ŝirutropos mono grunn pashuun dua suru asoko  koske du höör mange braa muzik، koske du har kokoro ka ting es warui، os deki slucha për mange andër ting awen.

name: patjun
definition: frigmange patjun ka est mange samui ima

name: unnanil
definition: lestestesamui ka dekiliik, vapasamui de ka sjtofnen au pie jamete razkiva. (vapasamui 0 cjelvin)

name: upashbrú
definition: tingo en kokoro; mjetta tsui lapsitid mit fami, tid ka ende nai; koske samui luft tulla au du huske gammel huomi, au kokoro je tuo: tak upash ljeta kao made fudu; du nai deki se nil; du se tsatain al; du mus jalaka

name: upashlule
definition: chiisai tel fu upash mit eksiik fal. al upashlule chigau mit sebyatropos

name: nahttacu
definition: tacu kolanai na hel naht per ergo os tjucju jokutin fu sebja

name: maglo
definition: na tinko – glossa ka maxjena per djin, na suruko – per maxa glossa

name: hobientso
definition: suruko: suru na ŝirutropos mono grunn pashuun dua suru asoko ŝirutropos, men deki bruknai sore inne vona fu asoko pashuun

name: alhar
definition: tingko/liikko, fal fu jevaltropos/jevaltvjeri. Marxdjin mahasintua na alhar

name: fikpušói
definition: suruko – per vent per mah einn ting grunn afto nai mange bra/mahglau/ninténdo

name: namting duaajsho
definition: t-ko, ajsho harjena koske pash gotov namting per mik, dare dua gotov fsore; koske he brahanu namting dan ke on maha, on ajsho namting duaajsho dan.

name: koladaag
definition: daag per du, nai mono per kola. per suru ting du dua, au per bli os tatsu glau. ((auen nai mus hel daag، men deki jokitiid))

name: skjoi kekso
definition: bli hjernebaka os hjernebjuki (na pravda os na se)

name: skjekso
definition: bli hjernebaka os hjernebjuki (na pravda os na se)

name: advent
definition: un advent sodji = un sodji grun (ttb) mama fun tula mirainen de dekinai hadji suru jokutin ka tren mage tid. awen: un sodji na advent fu mama fun

name: kaupunki
definition: (pasj ka dua os vil) vona ine stur polis, skjoi melan obastur hwomi, se stur klani na polisnaruga, skjine tak klani, hor ogoe zam, au au au au au. na andr hanutropos: pasj ka lera obadua ‘tjiknu’ fu polis

name: davka
definition: (suruliikko) – (suru yoku ting) kundr ka yoku pashun sluchamyeta os per maha ander pashun bööze

name: tarakán
definition: 1. tk: En pærson ka shkoi inne naht au tainasaada søtnam samuidvera/namdera kara au de tainashkoi ruum made fsore. Auen søtdjodjin, namdjodjin, 2. tk: Aftolik bagge ka tainasebja koske asa kirkas inne huomi

name: ishuglug
definition: se os høøre osos yokuting ka helena, iskat smak al chigau tel fu sore, au fshtoo au aistia na heel

name: rjohosa
definition: tk: mahjena glossa fu niplus glossa chigau os koske pash hanu aftóo glossa de tuo glossa de eins glossa plusraz inje sama fras

name: shaisa luft
definition: maha zan mit hinavittu

name: valabaka
definition: tingko/liikko – kawari inje fal/tropos fu ishu, jevalt auau. apaardjin hanu Future au Migos hadji valabaka inje hanulaulu. os Picassodjin inje riso

name: kompjuseeting
definition: ting ka brukdjin fu kompju dexjsee pebruk kompjuspil ososos

name: zigha-opétanen
definition: einn zam denva fu du kará (os terbi 📺 kará) – ogoè zam per opéta ka jam unzigha ting, ttb varúi pogódadai, lapsi-borte, auau

name: prosnutsatŝi
definition: suruko, owari kola, grunn slutŝa joku oogoe zam

name: plusogoedjin
definition: patjun ka suru mange hanu

name: lusodjin
definition: patjun ka suru mange hanu
